summary: THE ANTI-LOCK BRAKES ACTIVATED AT VERY LOW SPEEDS.  THE PEDAL MOVED UPWARD AND DRIVER PUSHED THE BRAKE PEDAL WITH FORCE BUT THE BRAKES DID NOT RESPOND.   *NLM  THE LEFT FRONT BRAKES FAILED 100% OF THE TIME AND THE RIGHT FRONT ASSEMBLY FAILED INTERMITTENTLY.  BOTH FRONT WHEEL BEARING ASSEMBLY/SENSORS WERE REPLACED.  THE BRAKE PEDAL HAD BECOME HARD AS A ROCK AND WOULD NOT STOP UNTIL BOTH FEET WERE PUSHED WITH MAXIMUM FORCE.  *SCC
